metadata.name: ANIM.JP #00001
metadata.description:
Our goal is to create animation from a decentralized community.

Producers, directors, supervisors, directors, animators, film crew, finishing crew, CG crew.
Various people join the community and establish a new standard for content production.
And from the planning stage as a new IP to pre-production, actual production, sound recording, and rush, the entire process is with the community.
These are special experiences only for NFT holders.

A DAO with the potential to become a completely new industry standard is born here, and those who own ANIM's first collection will be the first to experience the changing structure of the industry.

In the future, from the decentralized platform of ANIM, a stream of major studios will issue NFTs, which will truly become the industry standard. There is great potential for this to happen.

Once a community begins to take steps forward, it will continue to rewrite the common sense and industry conventions through its actual activities.

The wonderful people who have gathered here today are the embodiment and experience of the process of creating the future of animation.

We are moving steadily forward into the future, one step at a time.
